name: Squirrel Killers
description:
Squirrel killers it's a shoot em up that want to explore more the platform in this kind of games. In this adventure, William the Squirrel most to get revenge from the murder of his mother, and save his dad from prison.

Controls:

-ASDW: movement

backspace: shoot

-ASDW + backspace: Shoot in diferent directions

-ALT: jump

-E: grenade

-C: Heal

-shift: dash

-ESC: come back to the start menu

We are Jorge Manzano López and Cristian Docampo Santomé
